mapper.select: SELECT p.project_id, p.project_name, find_subcode(p.project_access) AS project_access, find_subcode(p.manager_accp) AS manager_accp, find_subcode(p.write_access) AS write_access, find_subcode(p.update_access) AS update_access, find_subcode(p.board_access) AS board_access, find_subcode(p.file_access) AS file_access, find_subcode(p.comment_access) AS comment_access, pp1.prj_particir_num, find_subcode(pp2.project_markup) AS project_markup, find_subcode(pp2.particir_accp) AS particir_accp, p.dept_id, p.project_cls FROM project p JOIN ( SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) AS prj_particir_num FROM prj_particir GROUP BY project_id ) pp1 ON (p.project_id = pp1.project_id) JOIN( SELECT project_markup, project_id, member_id, particir_accp FROM prj_particir )pp2 ON(pp1.project_id=pp2.project_id) WHERE pp2.member_id=#{memberId} ORDER BY p.project_id

SELECT DISTINCT p.project_id, p.project_name, find_subcode(p.project_access) AS project_access, find_subcode(p.manager_accp) AS manager_accp, find_subcode(p.write_access) AS write_access, find_subcode(p.update_access) AS update_access, find_subcode(p.board_access) AS board_access, find_subcode(p.file_access) AS file_access, find_subcode(p.comment_access) AS comment_access, (SELECT COUNT(*) from prj_particir pp WHERE p.project_id=pp.project_id) AS prj_particir_num, pp.member_id AS member_id, find_subcode(pp.particir_accp) AS particir_accp, p.dept_id, find_subcode(p.project_cls) AS project_cls FROM project p JOIN( SELECT member_id, project_id, particir_accp FROM prj_particir )pp ON (p.project_id=pp.project_id) WHERE dept_id IN (SELECT dept_id FROM department WHERE company_id= #{companyId}) ORDER BY p.project_id
